dmca.title: Science Education Site Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
GCSESCIENCE.COM
	Including
gcsechemistry.com 	gcsephysics.com
gcsechemistry.com.uk 	gcsephysics.com.uk
	schoolchem.com

23rd August 2003

Telephone xxxx-xxx-xxx-xxxx.	email [private]@gcsescience.com

Dear Sir/Madam,

1. The copyrighted work at issue is the gcsechemistry.com section of the gcsescience.com site. The entire chemistry section except the index has been copied. This is over 200 files. Some examples in order for 2. below are
gcsescience.com/ol7.htm,		gcsescience.com/ol5.htm,
gescscience.com/h8.htm,			gcsescience.com/h7.htm,
gcsescience.com/ex3.htm,		gcsescience.com/ex4.htm,
gcsescience.com/icalcium.htm,		gcsescience.com/exl3.htm.

2. Search Query hydrocarbons gcse	Infringing Web Pages
	chemistry.isb.ro/igcsechem/ol7.htm and	
chemistry.isb.ro/igcsechem/ol5.htm

Search Query haber process gcse			Infringing Web Pages
chemistry.isb.ro/igcsechem/h8.htm and chemistry.isb.ro/igcsechem/b7.htm

Search Query extraction of metals gcse		Infringing Web Pages
chemistry.isb.ro/igcsechem/ex3.htm and chemistry.isb.ro/igcsechem/ex4.htm

Search Query blast furnace gcsc chemistry		Infringing Web Pages
Chemistry.isb.ro/igcsechem/icalcium.htm  and chemistry.isb.ro/igcsechcm/exl3.htm

3. My email address is [private]@gcsescience.com

4. The offending site is the International School of Bucharest. Email [private]@isb.ro

5, I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent or the law.

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Dr. [private]
Proprietor gcsescience.com.

[private]
WATFORD, HERTS xxxx xxx UK.
